parse.title: List of Creative Artists Agency clients

text.*:
Creative Artists Agency is thought to be the top agency in film, with a client list that includes "a near monopoly of A-list actors, writers, and directors."[1]

Contents

  • 1 Film
  • 2 Music
  • 3 Sports
  • 4 Television
  • 5 Video games
  • 6 Online
  • 7 Speakers
  • 8 Politicians
  • 9 References

Music[edit]

CAA dominates the music touring business, winning "Booking Agency of the Year" in 10 of the last 12 years and every year since 2002.[116] CAA's notability in the music industry is a product of their roster of top billing acts, including:

  • 50 Cent
  • AC/DC[117]
  • Christina Aguilera[117]
  • Beyoncé[118]
  • Bon Jovi[103][119]
  • Brandy
  • Mariah Carey[117]
  • Kelly Clarkson[120]
  • Harry Connick, Jr.[121]
  • Miley Cyrus[122] (moved to Maverick)
  • Evanescence[123]
  • John Fogerty[124]
  • Ariana Grande[125]
  • Green Day[117]
  • Christina Grimmie
  • Faith Hill[119]
  • Devonté Hynes
  • Alan Jackson
  • Lady Gaga[59]
  • The Lighthouse Family
  • Lil Wayne[126]
  • Demi Lovato[127]
  • Ludacris[128]
  • John Mayer[117]
  • Tim McGraw[6]
  • Megadeth[129]
  • Kylie Minogue[130]
  • Misha
  • Alanis Morissette[119]
  • Olly Murs
  • Willie Nelson
  • Owl City
  • Pentatonix[131]
  • Kellie Pickler[132]
  • Radiohead[119]
  • Russ
  • Jessica Sanchez
  • Shakira[117]
  • Ed Sheeran (outside US and Canada)[133]
  • Bruce Springsteen[134]
  • Sting[135]
  • Harry Styles[136]
  • Twenty One Pilots[137]
  • Carrie Underwood[138]
  • Keith Urban[117]
  • Kanye West[139]
  • Wonder Girls[140] (in the US)
  • Stevie Wonder[117]

Tours booked by CAA[141][142] include High School Musical, Hannah Montana, Warped Tour, American Idol and Taste of Chaos.

Sports[edit]

The Sports Business Journal has called CAA "the dominant sports agency in the United States",[143] and has recognized CAA Sports as the Agency of the Year in 2009,[144] 2010[145] and 2011.[citation needed]

CAA Sports clients include

  • David Beckham[6]
  • John Calipari[146]
  • Sidney Crosby[6]
  • TJ Dillashaw[147]
  • Derek Jeter[6]
  • Anže Kopitar[148]
  • Eli Manning[103]
  • Peyton Manning[6]
  • José Mourinho
  • Tony Parker[149]
  • Adrian Peterson
  • Tony Romo[150]
  • Cristiano Ronaldo[151]
  • Georges St-Pierre[152]
  • Daniel Sedin[148]
  • Henrik Sedin[148]
  • LaDainian Tomlinson[150]

Television[edit]

Notable for putting the deal together for Oprah Winfrey's cable channel, OWN,[153] CAA's presence in the television industry is defined by clients of Winfrey's stature such as:

  • Edd China
  • Stephen Colbert[154]
  • James Corden[155]
  • Katie Couric[6]
  • Simon Cowell[156]
  • Timothy DeLaGhetto[157]
  • Jimmy Fallon[158]
  • Jeff Greenstein[159]
  • Colin Jost[160]
  • David Letterman[161]
  • Eva Longoria[162]
  • Bill Maher[163]
  • Camila Mendes[164]
  • Seth Meyers[165]
  • Trevor Noah[166]
  • Jeremy Piven[167]
  • Ellen Pompeo[168]
  • Ryan Seacrest[156]
  • Gary Sinise[169]
  • George Stephanopoulos[170]
  • Kiefer Sutherland[171]
  • Kate Walsh[172]

Clients also include the creators of hundreds of shows including American Idol,[156] the CSI franchise,[6] Two and a Half Men,[173] Glee, Grey’s Anatomy,[174] House,[175] 30 Rock,[103] The Amazing Race[176] and Lost.[6]

Video games[edit]

Jason West and Vince Zampella[177] signed with CAA after being fired from their positions at Infinity Ward in early 2010. According to FastCompany, CAA represents game designers Will Wright, Tim Schafer, Shinji Mikami, Goichi Suda, and Cliff Bleszinski, and has courted Kellee Santiago and Jenova Chen.[178]

Online[edit]

  • Amanda Cerny[179]
  • The Dobre Brothers
  • fouseyTUBE
  • Gabbie Hanna
  • Mamrie Hart
  • Liza Koshy
  • Logan Paul[180]
  • Juanpa Zurita
  • Mariale Marrero[181]

Speakers[edit]

Caitlyn Jenner signed with CAA's Speakers department to help her identify speaking opportunities to spread awareness about issues facing the transgender community.[182]

Politicians[edit]

In February 2017, former Vice President Joe Biden signed with the agency to represent himself and his wife, Dr. Jill Biden, across all areas, including their initiative to end cancer they began during their final years in office, partnerships with the University of Delaware and the University of Pennsylvania, and the Biden Foundation.[183]
